content: this is the official ravelry page for the in bloom cal hosted by www favoritgarner se and mijocrochet this cal started on the 7th of january 2017 for more information visit www mijocrochet wordpress com or join the facebook group mysterievirkning / cal med favoritgarner se which has information in both english and swedish the yarn used in this cal is sceepjes catona 50g you will need 10 skeins and 4 of these as base colour visit www favoritgarner se to see the yarn kits that are made for this cal if you use the suggested yarn and hook sizes you will make a cushion cover front and back for a 45 x 45 cm cushion this pattern will remain in the fb-group and on www mijocrochet wordpress com even after the event is over please use #inbloomcal in social medias so we all can enjoy the pretty flowers link to pattern https //mijocrochet wordpress com/2017/01/16/in-bloom-cal-monster-pattern/ link to introduction/information about the cal https //mijocrochet wordpress com/2016/11/29/cal-in-bloom/ p s there is a dutch translation in pipeline stay tuned d s
